title: Subchapter B - REAL ESTATE SYNDICATES
content:
Subchapter B - REAL ESTATE SYNDICATES
State Regulations

Part 16 - REAL ESTATE SYNDICATION OFFERINGS (§ 16.1 to 16.12)

Part 17 - COOPERATIVE APARTMENT OFFERINGS (§ 17.1 to 17.8)

Part 18 - OCCUPIED COOPERATIVES (§ 18.1 to 18.9)

Part 19 - CONDOMINIUM OFFERINGS (§ 19.1 to 19.8)

Part 20 - NEWLY CONSTRUCTED, VACANT OR NON-RESIDENTIAL CONDOMINIUMS (§ 20.1 to 20.7)

Part 21 - NEWLY CONSTRUCTED AND VACANT COOPERATIVES (§ 21.1 to 21.7)

Part 22 - NEWLY CONSTRUCTED, VACANT HOMEOWNERS ASSOCIATIONS OR NON-RESIDENTIAL PROPERTY OWNERS ASSOCIATIONS (§ 22.1 to 22.8)

Part 23 - OCCUPIED CONDOMINIUMS (§ 23.1 to 23.9)

Part 24 - TIMESHARE OFFERING PLANS (§ 24.1 to 24.7)

Part 25 - NEWLY CONSTRUCTED OR VACANT SENIOR RESIDENTIAL COMMUNITIES (§ 25.1 to 25.7)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
